FILE: cm645732v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAQ - S. KOREA
RIVALRY: RIV1235
DISPUTE(S): MID3078 MID3033 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190311
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190311

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3078 

TERRMID: MID3078 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3078 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3078 from Gibler 2018, in 1982 Iraq bombed a South Korean oil tanker. Iraq routinely attacked oil tankers from countries trading with Iran to harm Iran's economy during the Iran-Iraq War. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID3078 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3078 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3078 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3078 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3078 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3078 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3078 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3033 

TERRMID: MID3033 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3033 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3033 from Gibler 2018, in 1985 Iraq bombed a South Korean oil tanker. Iraq routinely attacked oil tankers from countries trading with Iran to harm Iran's economy during the Iran-Iraq War. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID3033 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3033 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3033 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3033 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID-CER: MID3033 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES:

COUPLINK-NOTES:
